casebody.data:
IN the INTEREST OF: C.M.W.; Plaintiff, Juvenile Officer, Respondent,
v.
F.J.W., Jr., (Father), Appellant. WD 81064 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: May 9, 2018 Richard Koehler, Butler, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Katie Evans, Appleton City, MO, Counsel for Plaintiff. Attorneys: Michael Baker, Clinton, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Lisa White Hardwick, P.J., Thomas H. Newton, and Cynthia L. Martin, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam

F.J.W., Jr. (Father) appeals a judgment from the Juvenile Division of the Bates County Circuit Court making his infant child, C.M.W. (Child), a ward of the court and giving legal custody of the child to the Bates County Children's Division of the Missouri Department of Social Services. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
